name: Mentorcam
headline: Mentorship from leaders of the world's best companies
description: Mentorcam is a marketplace for 1:1 business and career advice.

founders.name: Rune Hauge, Founder
founders.description: Rune Hauge is the CEO of Mentorcam and has 10+ years of experience building and scaling startups. He previously founded apparel brand Hardhaus (acquired) and video shopping software startup Preplay. An avid skier, he can often be found on a remote mountaintop somewhere in the Rockies when he's not working on Mentorcam.

## Access to an elite network
Mentorcam’s network of elite founders and business professionals are available to you on-demand.
Whether you work with a specific expert or seek input from multiple advisors, your network just got instantly stronger.
All Mentorcam experts are carefully vetted and have proven track records as highly successful builders and operators.
![Access to an elite network](https://res.cloudinary.com/mentorcam/image/upload/ar_528:436,c_lfill,f_auto,g_face:center,q_100,w_600/v1/website/home/Mentor_Network_Image_fm0ggw.png)
## Talk face to face on 1:1 video calls
Talk in real time on 1:1 video calls and get the advice and direction you need, when you need it.
Share your challenges in a safe and confidential environment and carve out a path to success.
Whether you’re looking for help fundraising, acquiring users, or developing tactical sales skills, an expert is here to help.
![Talk face to face on 1:1 video calls](https://res.cloudinary.com/mentorcam/image/upload/ar_699:470,c_lfill,f_auto,g_auto:face,q_100,w_800/v1/website/home/Face_to_Face_Video_Image_e4sms1.png)
## Message your mentor
Send messages before and after your calls. Access your messages at any time from your desktop or mobile device.
Share an agenda with topics to discuss or upload files for review. Set milestones and discuss progress between calls.
Mentorcam keeps everything on one platform so your conversation is always safe and secure.
![Message your mentor](https://res.cloudinary.com/mentorcam/image/upload/ar_578:443,c_lfill,f_auto,g_face:center,q_100,w_650/v1/website/home/Message_Mentor_Image_avggpy.png)
![Founder, Creativo Platform](https://res.cloudinary.com/mentorcam/image/upload/ar_1:1,c_fill,f_auto,g_auto:face,q_100,r_max,w_144/v1/testimonials/XhL6fku7GH40Um42LKCm/images/-N_4tXecOSjuPFlz5Lk1.jpg)

## Access to an elite network
Mentorcam’s network of elite founders and business professionals are available to you on-demand.
Whether you work with a specific expert or seek input from multiple advisors, your network just got instantly stronger.
All Mentorcam experts are carefully vetted and have proven track records as highly successful builders and operators.
![Access to an elite network⟨74⟩]
## Talk face to face on 1:1 video calls
Talk in real time on 1:1 video calls and get the advice and direction you need, when you need it.
Share your challenges in a safe and confidential environment and carve out a path to success.
Whether you’re looking for help fundraising, acquiring users, or developing tactical sales skills, an expert is here to help.
![Talk face to face on 1:1 video calls⟨75⟩]
## Message your mentor
Send messages before and after your calls. Access your messages at any time from your desktop or mobile device.
Share an agenda with topics to discuss or upload files for review. Set milestones and discuss progress between calls.
Mentorcam keeps everything on one platform so your conversation is always safe and secure.
![Message your mentor⟨76⟩]

generated_description:
### Mentorcam: Unlocking Access to Mentorship

**Overview**  
Founded in 2019 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Mentorcam is based in Los Angeles and operates as a marketplace for 1:1 business and career mentorship. The platform connects individuals with leaders from top companies, providing tailored advice from industry veterans. With a team of nine passionate employees, Mentorcam is dedicated to transforming the mentorship landscape.

**Mission**  
At its core, Mentorcam aims to democratize mentorship by bridging the gap between aspiring entrepreneurs and seasoned professionals. Their mission, encapsulated in the phrase “Mentorship from leaders of the world's best companies,” reflects their commitment to providing high-quality guidance.

**How It Works**  
Users can browse an extensive network of mentors across various expertise and industry sectors, including B2B sales, fundraising, growth marketing, and more. Mentorcam allows individuals to book video calls with mentors who have proven track records in their respective fields. This setup not only fosters personalized learning experiences but also enables users to discuss industry-specific challenges in real time.

**Benefits of Using Mentorcam**  
- **Personalized Guidance:** Users can receive customized advice tailored to their specific needs and sectors.
- **On-Demand Mentorship:** With an elite network of vetted mentors, users can connect with experienced professionals whenever they need insight.
- **Real-Time Communication:** The platform supports 1:1 video calls, allowing for immediate discussions of pressing business issues.
- **Continuous Interaction:** Users can message mentors before and after sessions to maintain continuity in their learning journeys.

**Diverse Mentoring Opportunities**  
Mentorcam covers a wide array of industries including artificial intelligence, healthcare, fintech, e-commerce, and more. Their mentors come from highly regarded companies such as TikTok, Google, and Y Combinator, ensuring that users gain insights from the best.

**Client Testimonials**  
Users have reported significant positive outcomes from their mentorship sessions, including improved fundraising capabilities, enhanced operational strategies, and accelerated business growth. For example, one founder mentioned that their mentor played a crucial role in raising $1.42 million for their startup.

**Getting Started**  
Interested individuals can easily sign up on [Mentorcam's website](https://mentor.cam/) to start booking sessions with mentors. They often offer discounts on first-time sessions to encourage new users to experience the benefits of mentorship.

**Conclusion**  
Mentorcam isn’t just another educational platform; it’s a valuable resource for anyone looking to deepen their understanding of business practices and accelerate their professional growth. With access to mentors who have been there and done that, users can carve out their paths to success with confidence. This blend of technology and mentorship has the potential to unlock countless opportunities for aspiring entrepreneurs and seasoned professionals alike.
